item.title: Lunch Reservation
item.description: Pre-registration for lunch has closed! Thank you for your interest. We will still have lunches to be sold, but you will have to go to the information desk at the conference venue during the conference to inquire about this.
item.dc:creator: Jonas

item.title: Workshop: Embedding Qt
item.description:
The slides are available at: http://www.slideshare.net/fscons2009/embedding-qt

Johan Thelin

A workshop focusing on using Qt for embedded Linux. This involved
configuring and building Qt and tools, emulating the target system and
deploying onto the actual target system.
item.dc:creator: Jonas

item.title: Hackerspaces FTW!
item.description:
Karin Kosina

Hackerspaces FTW!

Hackerspaces are real-life meeting places for creative people to get together to share knowledge, explore, learn, tinker with new technologies, socialise, have ideas and make them happen. Our vision is to enable people to stop being consumers and start being creators.

read more
item.dc:creator: Jonas

item.title: About FSCONS
item.description:
Free Society Conference and Nordic Summit

The Road Ahead in the Nordic Countries
13-15 November 2009
UPDATED: IT Universitetet, Forskningsgången 6, Lindholmen, Göteborg, Sweden

The Free Society Conference and Nordic Summit (FSCONS) is a meeting place for social change, focused on the future of free software and free society. The growing speed of new and innovative changes taking place within digital culture, as well as the pressing need for members of a marginalized society to gain access to important, updated information without financial or governmental barriers, the 2009 FSCONS will deal with an array of hot topics.

read more
item.dc:creator: Rikard
